description: The term '''Creole music''' ({{langx|fr|musique cr√©ole}}) is used to refer to two distinct musical traditions: [[Art song|art songs]] adapted from 19th-century vernacular music; or the [[Vernacular music|vernacular]] traditions of [[Louisiana Creole people]] which have persisted as 20th- and 21st-century la la and [[zydeco]] in addition to influencing [[Cajun music]].
